name: The Construct (itch) (Salvador Dev, Pedro Coutinho)
description:
You can escape prisons, but can you escape your mind? 

You have been contracted to escape a prison, but a different kind of one…

Main Features:
  • Solve reality defying puzzles: Challenging puzzles await you. 
  • Shift your perception of life: Be ready to experience what it’s like to be stuck on your own head… 
Controls:

The Construct is compatible with most standard computer keyboards and mouses.

  • Basic movment: WASD;
  • Interact: Left click;
  • Change Item: Scroll wheel;
Further Information

The Construct was developed in the University Lusófona, second year (2021), Bachelor in Videogames by: 

• João Borges

• Nelson Salvador 

• Pedro Coutinho
